commands_list: `/search <query>` - Search and select music on YouTube
button_controls_list: â¸ï¸/â–¶ï¸ **Pause/Resume** - Pause or resume the music
â­ï¸ **Skip** - Skip to the next song
platforms_list: ğŸ”— **Direct Link** - MP3, WAV, OGG files
features_list: ğŸ” **Permission System** - Only authorized users and the music starter can control
ğŸ†” **Security** - Unique ID per session, old buttons don't work
ğŸ“± **Dynamic Interface** - Buttons update according to status
ğŸ§¹ **Auto Cleanup** - Unnecessary messages deleted after 10 seconds
ğŸ”„ **Auto Leave** - Automatically leaves 5 minutes after music ends
